SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.listeners

Interface ViewSubject

All Known Subinterfaces:
UI
All Known Implementing Classes:
GUI, TextualUI
public interface ViewSubject
ViewSubject is an interface implemented in all UI classes, it contains notification update methods about choices made by a player and disconnections

  • Method Summary

    Method to add a client as a listener

    notifies about disconnection

    notifyObservers(Client o, List<int[]> arg1, Integer arg2)
    Invokes methods that set the "changed" flag to true and notifies observers about the client and its tiles and the shelf's column choices

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      void addListener(Server o)
      Method to add a client as a listener
      Parameters:
      o - client to be added as listener

    • notifyObservers

      void notifyObservers(Client o, List<int[]> arg1, Integer arg2) throws RemoteException
      Invokes methods that set the "changed" flag to true and notifies observers about the client and its tiles and the shelf's column choices
      Parameters:
      o - the client making the choices
      arg1 - the item's coordinates chosen
      arg2 - the shelf's column choice
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if the execution of a remote method call goes wrong

    • notifyDisconnection

      void notifyDisconnection(List<String> notificationList) throws RemoteException
      notifies about disconnection
      Parameters:
      notificationList - list of possible disconnection
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if another client has disconnected
